# 數值的運算
```{r}
first_num <- 8
second_num <- 7
first_num + second_num
first_num - second_num
first_num * second_num
first_num / second_num
first_num^second_num
first_num %% second_num
```
# 整數的運算
```{r}
first_int <- 8L
second_int <- 7L
ans <- first_int * second_int
ans
class(ans)
ans <- first_int / second_int
ans
class(ans)
```

# 數值與整數的運算
```{r}
my_num <- 8
my_int <- 7L
ans <- my_num + my_int
class(ans)
```
